name: Apple-
description: 1 - npm init -y 2 - npm install tailwindcss 3 - create src folder 4 - create "style.css" file inside "srs" folder 5 - insert into "style.css"     @tailwind base;     @tailwind components;     @tailwind utilities; 6 - create new folder named "public" 7 - create "style.css" inside "public" folder      8 - create "index.html" inside "public" folder  9 - edit this secript inside "package.json" folder        "scripts": {             "build:css": "tailwind build src/style.css -o public/style.css "        }, 10 - npm run build:css
